DOC.brief_title: Fluorouracil Leucovorin With Without Irinotecan Treating Patients Following Surgery Stage III Colorectal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare disease-free survival 3 year patient resect stage III colorectal cancer treat adjuvant fluorouracil leucovorin calcium without irinotecan . - Compare disease-free overall survival 5 year patient treat regimen . - Compare safety profile treatment regimens patient . - Compare quality-adjusted survival patient treat regimen . - Correlate expression putative prognostic marker ( thymidylate synthase , telomerase , topoisomerase ) disease-free overall survival patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : This randomize , open-label , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord participate center . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . Arm I - Patients receive irinotecan IV 30-90 minute , leucovorin calcium IV 2 hour , fluorouracil IV 24 hour weekly 6 week . Courses repeat every 7 week 4 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . - As alternative schedule , patient may receive irinotecan IV 30-90 minute day 1 leucovorin calcium IV 2 hour fluorouracil IV 22 hour day 1 2 every 2 week 6 week . Treatment repeat every 6 week 4 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Arm II - Patients receive leucovorin calcium fluorouracil arm I . Quality life may assess baseline ; prior course 2 , 3 , 4 ; 1 , 3 , 6 month . Patients follow every 3 month 3 year every 6 month 2 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 1800 patient ( 900 per arm ) accrue study within 24 month .
